operations.query: INSERT {{ ?site a brick:Site ; brick:label ?label . }} WHERE {{ ?site a phIoT:site ; rdfs:label ?label . }}
INSERT {{ ?ahu a brick:AHU ; brick:label ?label . }} WHERE {{ ?ahu a/ph:is* phIoT:ahu ; rdfs:label ?label . }}

INSERT {{ ?ahu brick:feeds ?vav . ?ahu a brick:AHU ; brick:label ?ahu_label . ?vav a brick:VAV ; brick:label ?vav_label . }} WHERE {{ ?vav a/ph:is* phIoT:vav ; rdfs:label ?vav_label . ?ahu a/ph:is* phIoT:ahu ; rdfs:label ?ahu_label . ?vav phIoT:equipRef ?ahu .}}

INSERT {{ ?vav brick:hasPoint ?point . ?point a brick:Point ; brick:label ?point_label . ?vav a brick:VAV ; brick:label ?vav_label . }} WHERE {{ ?vav a/ph:is* phIoT:vav ; rdfs:label ?vav_label . ?point a/ph:is* phIoT:point ; rdfs:label ?point_label . ?point phIoT:equipRef ?vav .}}

INSERT {{ ?instance1 brick:feeds ?instance2 . ?instance1 brick:regulates brick:Air . ?instance2 brick:regulates brick:Air . }} WHERE {{   ?instance1 a/(ph:is|rdfs:subClassOf)* phIoT:air-output . ?instance2 a/(ph:is|rdfs:subClassOf)* phIoT:air-input . ?instance2 phIoT:airRef ?instance1 .}}

INSERT {{ ?instance1 brick:hasPart ?instance2 . }} WHERE {{   ?instance1 a/(ph:is|rdfs:subClassOf)* phIoT:elec-output . ?instance2 a/(ph:is|rdfs:subClassOf)* phIoT:elec-input . ?instance2 phIoT:submeterOf ?instance1 .}}

INSERT {{ ?equipment brick:hasPoint ?point ; a brick:Equipment ; brick:label ?equipment_label . ?point a brick:Enable_Command ; brick:label ?point_label . }} WHERE {{ ?point ph:hasTag phIoT:enable ; rdfs:label ?point_label ; phIoT:equipRef ?equipment . ?equipment rdfs:label ?equipment_label . }}
INSERT {{ ?point a brick:Sensor ; brick:label ?point_label . }} WHERE {{ ?point ph:hasTag phIoT:sensor ; rdfs:label ?point_label ; a/ph:is* phIoT:point .}}
INSERT {{ ?point a brick:Setpoint ; brick:label ?point_label . }} WHERE {{ ?point ph:hasTag phIoT:sp ; rdfs:label ?point_label ; a/ph:is* phIoT:point .}}
INSERT {{ ?point a brick:Command ; brick:label ?point_label . }} WHERE {{ ?point ph:hasTag phIoT:cmd ; rdfs:label ?point_label ; a/ph:is* phIoT:point .}}

INSERT {{ ?fan a brick:Fan ; brick:label ?fan_label . ?equipment a brick:Equipment ; brick:label ?equipment_label; brick:hasPart ?fan . }} WHERE {{ ?fan ph:hasTag phIoT:fan, phIoT:hvac; rdfs:label ?fan_label ; phIoT:equipRef ?equipment . ?equipment rdfs:label ?equipment_label . }}
INSERT {{ ?instance a ?brick_class ; brick:label ?label }} WHERE {{ ?instance a/ph:is* ?hs_class ; rdfs:label ?label . ?hs_class ba:similarTo ?brick_class .   }}
INSERT {{ ?instance a brick:Gas_Meter . }} WHERE {{ ?instance ph:hasTag phScience:gas, phIoT:equip, phIoT:meter; rdfs:label ?instance_label . }}
INSERT {{ ?instance a brick:Water_Meter . }} WHERE {{ ?instance ph:hasTag phScience:water, phIoT:equip, phIoT:meter; rdfs:label ?instance_label . }}
INSERT {{ ?instance a brick:Electrical_Meter ; brick:label ?instance_label . }} WHERE {{ ?instance ph:hasTag phScience:elec, phIoT:equip, phIoT:meter; rdfs:label ?instance_label . }}
INSERT {{ ?instance a brick:Water_Valve ; brick:label ?instance_label . }} WHERE {{ ?instance ph:hasTag phScience:water, phIoT:valve; rdfs:label ?instance_label . }}
